A few days ago I finally got word from Siegel giving us a
deadline for the "Prix Italia‚Äù as of August 1st. Such a
deadline gives us substantially no time at all to make
a creditable entry so we have had to drop the matter.
If it would be at all possible we should have more notice
next year as we were rather anxious to make an entry, but
felt that the notice came entirely too late to enable
us to do anything about it.
With best personal wishes, I remain
Elmer G# Sulzer, Director
Radio and Television Communications
